summary: This document is an email correspondence between Lisa D. Hurd and Amanda Kirby discussing mutual funds and a shell account. The communication indicates a need for manual posting of mutual funds and inquiries about the status of certain positions.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D. Hurd is communicating about mutual funds and their posting.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is inquiring about the status of certain financial positions.

keyFacts: The email discusses mutual funds that need to be manually posted.
Lisa D. Hurd is requesting a call for further discussion.
Amanda Kirby is following up on the status of financial positions related to a shell account.
